title: Did anyone get a trophy for winning Clash?
body: Won the bracket but didnt get the trophy for the profile FeelsBadMan. Was there not one for the beta cup?

replies.body: Hi Rhyno, I just double checked this with the Clash team and confirmed there are no trophies for the beta cup. Congrats on the win though!
Oh ok, was still alot of fun regardless! Ty for the reply :)
I got the summoner Icon, but no trophy
